name: Pokémon The Fall of Heroes
overview: Pokemon The Fall of Heroes is a GBA Rom Hack based on Pokemon Fire Red. It has been 10 years since the events of Pokémon Red Fire and Pokémon Ruby: RED of Paleta Town managed to expose and stop Team Rocket and its evil plans, avoiding its seizure of the Kanto region. Simultaneously, BRENDAN stopped the plans of the Aqua and Magma Teams maintaining the climate balance in the Hoenn region. 3 years later, GOLD made its trip through the regions of Kanto and Johto, in which it managed to stop the resurrection plans of the Rocket Team, thus preserving peace in the region. The exploits of these three great heroes were forever recorded in the history of the three regions, allowing enjoy a period of calm and peace. Each and every one of them reached the peak to which Pokémon Trainers aspire, becoming role models for a whole new generation of young people throughout the world.
